author: Peter Wright
content:
It was incredible that Magic was back on the water at all, it is a credit to the NYYC team and to the other teams that helped them in the true spirit of sportsmanship.

I am sure they will be back next time.

author: Willy
content:
it was interesting to watch on youtube how these ships operate.
Anyone else look at these craft and think the design was modeled on a whale?

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: They will come back stronger next time, there is a lot of pride at stake.
